subject: Golf
Legs
Amputation
Accidents and Safety
Grief (Emotions)
lead_paragraph: Ken Green, who once basked near the top of the money list and later cleaned out his savings, thought he had lost everything until an accident took his friends and his leg.
snippet: Ken Green, who once basked near the top of the money list and later cleaned out his savings, thought he had lost everything until an accident took his friends and his leg.
